title: polymerbit
author: polymerbit
created_time: August 03, 2022, 05:53:57 PMLast edit: August 29, 2022, 04:26:22 PM by polymerbit
content: We will be attending with a table starting on August 18th and will bring some Bitcoin collectibles, not just Polymerbit notes. I'm curious to see how the greater numismatic market reacts to this niche. I will report back in this thread on our findings. In the meantime, any Bitcointalk members are welcome to come visit us

In the meantime, any Bitcointalk members are welcome to come visit us  Awesome!

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: So how did it go? Did anyone purchase any bitcoin collectibles at the show ? Was anyone familiar with them? Did you have a good time?

comments.author: polymerbit
comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on August 22, 2022, 07:41:44 PMSo how did it go? Did anyone purchase any bitcoin collectibles at the show ? Was anyone familiar with them? Did you have a good time? I will be posting an in-depth review in the coming days. We were genuinely surprised by the reactions.
